name: Easy Grilled Shrimp Fajitas
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Quick and easy shrimp fajitas on the grill. Don't forget your favorite toppings such as guacamole, salsa, and sour cream.
ingredients: 1  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
1  green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
1 large onion, sliced into thin strips
2 ½ teaspoons fajita seasoning mix, divided
12 ounces raw large shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Place bell pepper strips, onion, and jalapeno slices in a large bowl
Add 2 teaspoons of fajita seasoning and olive oil
Place shrimp in a separate bowl
Add remaining 1/2 teaspoon fajita seasoning and lime juice
Place vegetable mixture in a grill basket
Stir in shrimp and grill for 5 minutes more
Place tortillas on the grill and toast for 2 minutes
Divide filling between the tortillas and serve
